version_description:
What’s new:
Hey you! Yeah, you. You who’s about to download our new update featuring awesome changes and stability improvements. That’s right, right up for the Flyers winning the fame and glory!
1. Less clicks = less work for your overworked fingers. Those guys are tired. Give ‘em a break and enjoy the mighty Game.
2. With all of our products on display, you'll never miss your favorite snack, ice cream or essential ever again.

### Features:
*Improved notification system - now you will always be on par with the latest news and promos from the start.
*Added handling for new promo code related errors.

### Bugfix:
* Product quantity will be reset correctly for related products.
* Added ability to reload categories in case of an error.
* Removed network activity indicator in cart.
* Fixed appearance of wrong price during past order reordering.
* Fixed case where order's postal code would not be updated during address change.
* Fixed rare crash during transition from products screen back to categories while products screen has been scrolling.

Stability enhancements
*A more flexible integration for newbies/usability experience.
Have we made our case? Now quit reading this, and…download our update

Looks aren't everything, but they definitely help. That's why our new update features the sleekest technological design you've seen since the mechanical pencil (sorry #2). With a bold new tile layout, fresh category photos and such overwhelming style that you'll want to take us on a sushi date, your goPuff experience has never been looked better and never been easier. Update now!

### Improvements:
* Added new categories images alignment and design.
* Changed placeholder message at order instructions.
* A message is now shown if no item from past order can be reordered.
* Increased search response time

### Bugfix:
* Fixed case where free delivery progress bar would be still present after address change with cart clearance.
* Fixed rare crash after categories horizontal swipe.
* Fixed rare crash with navigation from cart and categories.
* Fixed filters selection for categories.

Quit reading, update your beloved app and enjoy legendary delivery service.

Oops, we did it again: made the goPuff app even better for you! Yeah, you. Because we love you. Here's what's new:

1. We optimized functionality, which is a fancy way of saying the app is a lot faster. You know that we know that ain't nobody got time for that.
2. We added a "Recommended Products" feature to the top of your cart, so you'll never forgot to add milk to your cereal, or peanut butter to your jelly, or a spoon to your ice cream. The industry calls it "impulse within impulse," we call it genius.

### Additional Improvements
* Removed toolbar for the Main screen to improve access to your Categories.
* Added improved error handling.
* Page indicator for product photos now will be hidden if it has only one photo.

### Bug Fix
* Fixed bug with layout and clearance for recommended products.
* Fixed bug on application start up, then error message pop up on categories screen without internet connection.
* Fixed visual bug on Empty cart screen for devices with small screen.
* Fixed bug then quantity buttons icons were absent on a Product screen.
* Fixed bug when user unable to add new address manually after suggestions.

Until next time,
Your friends at goPuff

Oops, we did it again: made the goPuff app even better for you! Yeah, you. Because we love you. Here's what's new:

1. We optimized functionality, which is a fancy way of saying the app is a lot faster. You know that we know that ain't nobody got time for that.
2. We added a "Recommended Products" feature to the top of your cart, so you'll never forgot to add milk to your cereal, or peanut butter to your jelly, or a spoon to your ice cream. The industry calls it "impulse within impulse," we call it genius.

### Additional Improvements
* Removed toolbar for the Main screen to improve access to your Categories
* Added improved error handling
* Page indicator for product photos now will be hidden if it has only one photo
* Added zip auto detection for geolocation

### Bug Fix
* Fixed bug when cart did not clear if guest user changed delivery zone
* Fixed cart placeholder
* Fixed tip auto completion bug for regions that uses non dot decimal separator
* Fixed cart content quantity on item at cart
* Fixed bug for animation collapse on cart clear event

Until next time,
Your friends at goPuff

Huzzah, we did it again: made the goPuff app even better for you! Because we love you.
We optimized functionality, which is a fancy way of saying the app is a lot faster now. With all the awesomeness of providing your location for you. You know that we know that ain't nobody got time for that.

### Improvements and features:
* Improved ZIP detection time and performance.
* Added animation for applying a product to cart on Products screen.

### Bug fix:
* Fixed issue with rudimentary animation on Cart.
* Fixed profile avatar layout in landscape mode.
* Fixed issue with internet connection placeholder.
* Fixed issue with auto completion form with decimal separator.
* Fixed bug when product quantity buttons on cart receive tap event on swipe to delete action.
* Fixed custom presentation for product details.
* Fixed issue related to expanded recommended product list at the cart.

Until next time,
Your friends at goPuff

Huzzah, we did it again: made the goPuff app even better for you! Because we love you.
We optimized functionality, which is a fancy way of saying the app is a lot faster now. With all the awesomeness of providing your location for you. You know that we know that ain't nobody got time for that.

### Improvements and features:
* Improved ZIP detection time and performance.
* Added animation for applying a product to cart on Products screen.

### Bug fix:
* Fixed crash for iOS 10 users
* Fixed issue with rudimentary animation on Cart.
* Fixed profile avatar layout in landscape mode.
* Fixed issue with internet connection placeholder.
* Fixed issue with auto completion form with decimal separator.
* Fixed bug when product quantity buttons on cart receive tap event on swipe to delete action.
* Fixed custom presentation for product details.
* Fixed issue related to expanded recommended product list at the cart.

Until next time,
Your friends at goPuff

Hey fam!

We’re back with a new update because what else would we be doing in the App Store if not building an app to blow. your mind.

Here’s what’s new:

You can now login to goPuff with your phone number! Because you probably don’t remember your middle school email and definitely keep forgetting your password but you’ll never forget them digitz.

As if that wasn’t fun enough, we’ve improved the sh*t out of our search function! You’ll never not be able to find that snack you’re craving or that toilet paper you ran out of (yikes).

And of course, we know you’re all about that #aesthetic so our new design is even getting sleeker and cleaner and cooler and fresher than the sleekest, cleanest, coolest, freshest cat you know.

Now get out of here and get puffing!

xoxo,
your favorite app

Hey party people!

You're busy, so we'll keep this short. You gotta lotta things going on, so we also kept it organized. Introducing (drumroll please)...SUBCATEGORIES! We know, exxcciiitttiiing.

But when there's a whole category of your favorite munchies or dranks to scroll through, and your fingers are tired and your time is money, these lil' subcats make it much easier and quicker to make your selection, checkout, and get on witcha bad self.

Plus, they ain't no run-of-the-mill boring subcategories because, well, we're goPuff. I mean, why call it "family planning" when you can call it "sexy time"?

xoxo,
goPuff

Changes and minor bugfix:
* Added forwarding animation for Search.
* Fixed bug for locked search.
* Fixed loading for Subcategories screen.

xoxo,
goPuff

Hey friends!

You deserve nothing but the best delivery in the business, and your amazing goPuff drivers deserve a lil' love too! That's why in addition to small updates of general awesomeness, we've added a new feature to the app so you can hook your driver up with a TIP! Slide 'em a little, slide 'em a lot - if you loved your delivery, hook your driver up on the place order page and let them know you appreciate them putting on pants to bring you your snacks so you don't have to.

Peace, love and Pringles,
goPuff

WUDDDDUP HOMIIIIES! goPuff here (duh) to tell you what's new on the app. Drumroll please...

Pictures might be worth a thousand words, but videos are more fun. Soon you will be able to click your fav products on the app for video descriptions and original goPuff TV.

That's all for now, but we'll see all you avid app update readers next time!

Winter is here and we are ready for you, with a new and shiny update. Drumroll and snowflakes!

We made product description animation lighter and faster. Same for your beloved subcategories!

Major bugfix:
-Fixed rare crash during visiting Place Order screen;
-Fixed scrolling for the recommended stuff;
-Fixed low internet connection behavior and rare crash in that case;
-Fixed Tap bar menu animation on Search screen;
-Fixed warning, when user tries to delete the last address, but has something in his cart;
-Fixed bug, which locked Product search screen after the scroll

That's all for now, but we'll see all you avid app update readers next time!

Winter is here and we are ready for you, with a new and shiny update. Drumroll and snowflakes!

We made product description animation lighter and faster. Same for your beloved subcategories!
Major bugfix:
-Fixed rare crash during visiting Place Order screen;
-Fixed scrolling for the recommended stuff;
-Fixed low internet connection behavior and rare crash in that case;
-Fixed Tap bar menu animation on Search screen;
-Fixed warning, when user tries to delete the last address, but has something in his cart;
-Fixed bug, which locked Product search screen after the scroll

That's all for now, but we'll see all you avid app update readers next time!

That's all for now, but we'll see all you avid app update readers next time!

Drumroll and snowflakes! With our first release of the year, we want to make you happy during these lovely January time!
After some tinkering under the holiday's hood, we updated some stuff to make your puffing and munching easier.
Bugfix:
-Fixed view for subcategories display being stuck after continuous scroll;
-fixed bug then default address was not preselected;
-fixed bug, then new search was deprecating search results scroll up;
-fixed warnings, when user tries to remove specific products or decrease their quantity.
etc.

Winter is running it's course, snoring time is almost over, but we are always tweaking your goPuff experience. Just when you thought it all would be the same, here comes another release.
Actually, the good stuff is the same but now there's more of it!

Minor bugfixes:
-fixed rare crash on scroll of subcategories view;
-fixed issue, when UI can stop react on user interaction after scroll;
-fixed zip manual input clearance;
-fixed Tab Bar title font resize for iOS 11.2.x;
-fixed delivery view visibility bug after a session

March madness gave you hype, but April would be even better. As it turns out, you can find a ton of funny stuff on goPuff. Expand you delivery horizons with or Family.
Instead of wading through a massive amount of new app releases searching for a few diamonds in the rough, just open us and we will be your guide into the world of a quick delivery, where everything is at your fingertips.

Bugfix:
-fixed rare app crash on order status update in order history;
-fixed zone info popup upon location change;
-fixed the case then zip is not detected after cold start;
-fix small typo.

April is a rainbow month,
of sudden springtime showers.
Bright with golden daffodils,
and lots of pretty flowers.

So...... we decided to update your spring time roll - enjoy munching.

Peanut butter, caked and dry,
curdled milk and crusts of pie,
eggshells mixed with lemon custard,
cold french fries and yellow lumps,
cream of wheat and worlds of fun.

Jusssssst enjoy your spring time meal.
It's a click of fingertip.

Improvements:
-Improved pagination for order history and subcategories

Bugfixes:
-fixed error message on phone number edit;
-fixed activity indicator freeze state at home screen;
-fixed minor navigation issue on categories and search screens;
-fixed minor issue with iOS 10 category dropdown scroll.

Improvements:
-Improved pagination for order history and subcategories

Bugfixes:
-fixed error message on phone number edit;
-fixed activity indicator freeze state at home screen;
-fixed minor navigation issue on categories and search screens;
-fixed minor issue with iOS 10 category dropdown scroll.

Munching time! Lay the mutton down to roast, dress it nicely I desire,
In the dripping put a toast, munching is the way of love.
We all like to work and study, we like food and drinks delivered right to our doorstep.
With just a few taps get yourself a meal and enjoyment. Choose from hundreds of products and start munching with us.

Bugfixes:
-fixed bug with canceling change of the only default address user has;
-fixed issue where alerts could interfere with navigation;
-fixed rare crash on categories dropdown navigation;
-fixed issue when credit card was not updated then selected elsewhere;
etc.
New app update, who dis? Check out all the hot and fresh out the kitchen new features on goPuff!

You can't be fre$h to death without literally staying fresh, so you know we got poppin' app updates for ya'll! Here's what's hot:
Is there such a thing as a dessert with healthy stuff in it.. that also tastes good? Ideas for creating a joy-filled day and lovely nights - everything just on a touch of your fingertips. With munchies, ice cream, snacks and much more - delivered right to your doorstep.

Improvements:
-improved icons, categories design;
-better handling of search results and errors.

Bugfixes:
-fixed case then redirect category isn't shown after tapping on any other category in dropdown list;
-resolved case for subcategory name tab size which wasn't equally distributed if there are not enough screen space;
-resolved case for iOS 10 then related products (similarities) may not load;
-fixed incorrect error text return for discount and promos;
-fixed missing subcategory tab when switching categories on iOS 10;
-fixed double splicing on product price if screen was scrolled;
-fixed product image for search screen

You can't be fre$h to death without literally staying fresh, so you know we got poppin' app updates for ya'll! Here's what's hot:
Is there such a thing as a dessert with healthy stuff in it.. that also tastes good? Ideas for creating a joy-filled day and lovely nights - everything just on a touch of your fingertips. With munchies, ice cream, snacks and much more - delivered right to your doorstep.
Improvements:
-improved icons, categories design;
-better handling of search results and errors.

Bugfixes:
-fixed case then redirect category isn't shown after tapping on any other category in dropdown list;
-resolved case for subcategory name tab size which wasn't equally distributed if there are not enough screen space;
-resolved case for iOS 10 then related products (similarities) may not load;
-fixed incorrect error text return for discount and promos;
-fixed missing subcategory tab when switching categories on iOS 10;
-fixed double splicing on product price if screen was scrolled;
-fixed product image for search screen

WELL, BUCKLE UP PEOPLE! What's on tap? Food and drinks and deals on deals Every weekend, all summer long!
From food, drinks, ice cream, to household and relaxation supplies, we got it all!

Improvements:
-updated no internet connection error handling;
-better search options, applied badges logic;
-added Haptic Feedback for buttons and pull to refresh;
-added tab bar for search results screen.

Bugfixes:
-fixed rare app crash on categories selector;
-fixed app crash due to an inability to resume activity indicator;
-fixed warning messages on the home screen for closed hours;
-fixed rare case of lost internet connection leading to a broken address screen;
-fixed case when pull to refresh will not update subcategory data;
-fixed iOS 10 UI being broken in the cart

What's new:
You love Fall! We do to- and we're here for you! :slightly_smiling_face:
goPuff Delivers THE MOMENT! From food, drinks, and ice cream, to household and relaxation supplies, we got it all!

Improvements:
-updated navigation stack for categories.

Bugfix:
-fixed rare app crash on navigation between subcategories;
-fixed missed symbols on login;
-fixed counter failing to update on products in category after the purchase;
-fixed 'no internet connection' placeholder

Never met an app update we didn't like. Here's what's new:

Improvements:
- Added support for logout on all devices.

Bugfix:
- Fixed rare bug with navigation links.

Bugs are inconvenient. We’re not. So we fixed them! Here’s what’s new:

Improvements:
-navigation upscale for categories on user view;
-updated handling of user warnings and info on Scan of Credit Card;

Bugfix:
-fixed rare iOS 10+ stuck screen after navigation between subcategories;
-fixed a bug when scrolling on products category screen would not work after navigation.

Ding-dong! It’s us, your most convenient delivery service. To continue bringing you snacks, drinks, home essentials, booze and more in less than an hour means our service is constantly improving. Here’s how:

Improvements:
- refinement of default address storing in the app;
- enhancement for the ID Scan flow in the main app;

Bugfix:
- fixed rare App crash on moving app to the background while browsing subcategories;
- resolved minor issue when popup was stuck after change address.

Read more if you wanna know what’s new or just stop here because you trust us and love us and know that we won’t stop til’ we get enough and by enough we mean amazing updates and who reads this stuff, anyway?
Improvements:
-updated search;
-improved categories handling;

Bugfix:
-fixed rare app crash on iOS 12.1;
-fixed issue that led to softlock the application;
-fixed rare app crash for older iOS versions on Profile screen update;
-fixed error handling in a case of no internet connection;
-fixed music sound being lost when re-launching app from the foreground;
-fixed issue with subcategories scroll;
-fixed randomly absent title on categories selector;
etc.
Hey party people! The fall season is all about renewing and refreshing, so smash that UPDATE button and let those crisp new goPuff features leaf you breathless (that's an autumn pun).
New week, new updates, new goPuff orders!

Read more if you wanna know what’s new or just stop here because you trust us and love us and know that we won’t stop til’ we get enough and by enough we mean amazing updates and who reads this stuff, anyway?

Read more if you wanna know what’s new or just stop here because you trust us and love us and know that we won’t stop til’ we get enough and by enough we mean amazing updates and who reads this stuff, anyway?
Improvements:
-updated search;
-improved categories handling;

Bugfix:
-fixed rare app crash on iOS 12.1;
-fixed issue that led to softlock the application;
-fixed rare app crash for older iOS versions on Profile screen update;
-fixed error handling in a case of no internet connection;
-fixed music sound being lost when re-launching app from the foreground;
-fixed issue with subcategories scroll;
-fixed randomly absent title on categories selector;
etc.

You don’t become the most convenient convenience delivery app without making a few tweaks along the way. Download our newest version to keep deliveries running smoother than butter on a hot summer’s day.
The world might move fast, but we move faster. Download our newest version for UI/UX tweaks to help us deliver the things you need to keep you in the moment
We’re all about making moves, especially when it comes to getting you the things you need faster. Download our newest version and keep your app running like a well-oiled machine.

You're an update away from the most convenient convenience delivery app on both sides of the Mississippi.

Bugfix:
-improved Login phone field entry;
-fixed rare issue when input would be devoked with keyboard;
-fixed rare case when Profile image was not updated;
-spelling changes etc.

We want every goPuff experience to be more magical than the last, which is why we're always making moves to deliver you the best app possible. Get the newest update now and get one step closer to deliciousness delivered.

Improvements:
- improved Login phone field entry.

Bugfix:
- fixed bug with a scroll between subcategories;
- fixed rare crash in the background;
- spelling changes etc.

Don’t be afraid of change, especially when it means getting snacks delivered sooner. Keep your updates turned on to make sure you’re the first to get the latest and greatest.

Bugfix:
- fixed Cart tab being unresponsive on search;
- fixed categories dropdown being stuck after navigation;
- fixed app behavior activity after delivering push notification;
- fixed issue with closing the subcategory after navigation back.

We’re working around the clock to bring you convenience around the clock and this update will help us deliver just that. Download now and let's get this party started.

Improvements:
-updated warnings and errors text.

Bugfix:
-fixed rare app crash on invalid address being saved;
-fixed navigation back from cart being stuck sometimes.

When it comes to convenience, good things don't have to take time. Download our update now and get your in-the-moment needs the moment you need them.

Bugfix:
-fixed an issue when previously visited screen would be stuck;
-fixed Orders list with a wrong date of creation;
-resolved rare App unresponsive stance from inactivity;
-fixed rare case when two screens of categories would be opened over each other.

Snacks are better shared. Download the newest update now to make it even easier to share your love of all things convenient with your friends and family.

Improvements:
-improved design for friends sharing;

Bugfix:
-resolved rare case when app will freeze on relaunch from background due to inactive state;
-resolved an issue when after browsing and low internet connection products were opened without content.

You don't have to see it to believe it, but you'll love seeing your order in your hands even faster & easier.

Bugfix:
- fixed scrolling issue after category navigation;
- fixed rare case for iOS 11 when info popup would be dissected on view.

Filling your goPuff bag got easier, we deliver the moment and we've got a whole lot of treats in store for you.

Improvements:
-home screen view and navigation

Bugfix:
-fixed navigation glitch between search and cart;
-fixed rare inactive state of the app when input keyboard was called.

Never met an app update we didn't like. Here's what's new:

Improvements:
- Added support for logout on all devices.

Bugfix:
- Fixed rare bug with navigation links.

Bugs are inconvenient. We’re not. So we fixed them! Here’s what’s new:

Improvements:
-navigation upscale for categories on user view;
-updated handling of user warnings and info on Scan of Credit Card;

Bugfix:
-fixed rare iOS 10+ stuck screen after navigation between subcategories;
-fixed a bug when scrolling on products category screen would not work after navigation.

What’s new?! More like what isn’t new: just us, doing our favorite things, delivering you snacks, making some minor adjustments and kicking some minor bugs out of the way to make goPuff even more convenient for you.

Improvements:
- added better visual handling for loading screens.

Bugfix:
- added retry to handle rare cases with broken connection for iOS 12;
- fixed subcategories being stuck after navigation to search.

Lady Gaga once said "talented, brilliant, amazing, show stopping, spectacular, never before been done" about our new updates. Looks like you'll have to see it to believe it. Check out what's new here:

Bugfix:
- fixed rare unresponsive case with category navigation after app foreground state;
- fixed navigation issue between search and cart leading to the wrong load.

Out with the old, in with the new updates. Convenience has never been so bug-free. Here's what's new:

Improvements:
- optimized subcategory screen and list of products.

Ding-dong! It’s us, your most convenient delivery service. To continue bringing you snacks, drinks, home essentials, booze and more in less than an hour means our service is constantly improving. Here’s how:

Improvements:
- refinement of default address storing in the app;
- enhancement for the ID Scan flow in the main app;

Bugfix:
- fixed rare App crash on moving app to the background while browsing subcategories;
- resolved minor issue when popup was stuck after change address.

Improvements:
- improved overall categories performance and stability.
- improved scroll conduct for categories.

Bug fixes:
- fixed rare case of an App going into the inactive state on search results;
- resolved a minor issue when popup was stuck after navigation.

We didn’t choose the bug life. The bug life chose us. Our amazing tech team made some bug fixes in the goPuff app to improve your experience and keep us delivering whatever you need, whenever you need it. Stop reading these release notes and go order something before our copywriter tries to sing Tupac.

Improved app performance and stability.

Bug fixes:
- resolved navigation issue between categories.

Us: Releases app updates
Your Co Star Day at a Glance: You have to believe in something.
You: Gets snacks delivered with goPuff

Improvements:
- improved general performance and stability;
- updated handling for navigation in the app;

Bugfix:
- fixed rare app crash for iOS 13 on navigation scroll and app closure;
- fixed navigation glitch between address to category select.

Santa delivers toys. We deliver snacks. Santa only works one night a year. We're open year-round. Take a seat, Santa. We've got this one under control. GO, GO, GO.

Improvements:
- enhanced performance and stability.

Bug fix:
- handled rare case of a temporary unresponsive app state on open from foreground or doze;
- fixed minor scroll issue on subcategory level.

We’re thankful for a lot of things this year. Most importantly, we’re thankful for you, our customers. We’re thankful for peanut butter cups and sweatpants and Keanu Reeves and great friends. We’re also thankful to our awesome tech team, which made some bug fixes in the goPuff app to improve your experience.
Happy Holidays!

Improvements:
- enhanced stability and overall performance;
- better treatment of full-width product tile.

Bug fix:
- fixed carousels scroll being inactive on category;
- fixed rare app unresponsive behavior with loaded content.

Happy New Year! In 2020, we’re resolving to continue saving our customers time by delivering everything they need, when they need it. We keep our app just as speedy and reliable as our delivery, so we made some updates.

Improvements:
- enhanced stability and performance.

Bug fix:
- fixed rare case of stuck home screen after navigation;
- fixed rare app crash on swipe animation for iOS 13.

It’s getting cold outside, but things are heating up at goPuff. We’re working hard to continuously improve our awesome delivery service, so we made some updates to the app.

Improvements:
- stability enhancements and performance improvements.

Bugfix:
- categories broken view after scroll;
- ability to use a scrollable area on search.

Order in seconds & get it delivered in minutes. To keep our app (and delivery) speedy, we made some updates.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Get ready to fall in love with goPuff, the greatest delivery service out there (in our not-so-humble opinion). Daily essentials, food, snacks, drinks & everything else you need, delivered when you need it. Always for a flat $1.95 delivery fee.

Improvements:
- stability and performance enhancements.
 
Bug fix:
